title: Yes4All Weighted Vest for Men & Women - Weight Available: 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16 Lbs - Strength Training Weight Vests with Ankle/Wrist Weights for Workout, Cardio, Walking, Jogging & Running
features: 10-POUND IRON-FILLED WEIGHTED VEST: Yes4All Weighted Vest is filled with odorless iron sand to reduce smell and provide an even weight distribution, with reinforced stitching and sturdy outer trim to keep the sand in place, enhancing durability

BREATHABLE NEOPRENE MATERIAL: Our weighted vest features a soft, smooth neoprene surface to prevent abrasion on your skin while absorbing sweat and moisture. It also adds the right amount of resistance to help you achieve your fitness goal

ADJUSTABLE BUCKLE STRAPS & REFLECTIVE STRIPS: The two integrated adjustable buckle straps provide a great fit for both men and women while the reflective strips on both sides of the weight vest increase your safety when working out at night

INTEGRATED MESH POCKET: No more missing calls or items! Yes4All Weighted Vest comes with a mesh pocket at the back to give you more space to store your belongings like keys, earbuds or a phone to enjoy music during your workout

ADDITIONAL ANKLE WEIGHTS: Comes with a pair of 2-lbs ankle weights to help add more challenge to your workout routine, great for improving balance, coordination, body strength and accompanying your home workouts, jogging and many other exercises
description: NEW CHALLENGE WITH YES4ALL WEIGHTED VEST

Yes4All Workout Weighted Vest is designed with soft smooth elastic Neoprene fabric to provide the best comfort to your skin, as well as absorb moisture & sweat quickly during your intensive workout. In addition, the thick & wide shoulders deliver weight evenly & avoid shoulder fatigue, delighting your workout with ultimate comfort. The adjustable buckle & elastic straps ensure a customized fit for both men & women of different sizes. Say no to poor quality weighted vests on the market!Yes4All high-quality Workout Weighted Vest is filled with durable odorless iron sand to reduce smell & provide an even weight distribution. The reinforced stitching & sturdy outer trim prevent the iron sand from leaking out while enhancing value, durability, and longevity. The Workout Vest also comes with a mesh pocket at the back to give you more space to store keys, earbuds or a phone.
WEIGHT FUNCTION FOR MASSIVE BENEFITS INCREASE OUTPUT
The Weighted Vest can help in developing strength, endurance and cardio by increasing your body weight.
You can corporate the Workout Weighted Vest into running, physical therapy, home workouts, walking, jogging, core training, weightlifting, CrossFit, aerobics, gym and many more.
IDEAL FOR ALL AGES AND FITNESS LEVELS

Available in multiple weight options, Yes4All Weighted Vest can be used by men and women to burn fat, improve core strength and musculoskeletal system. 1-year & 30-day return (contact seller for more details)
